Name: Gaganyaan-1 (Backup)
MissionStatus: Upcoming uncrewed test flight for India's human spaceflight program.

Name: Aditya-L1
MissionStatus: India's first solar mission. Successfully inserted into Halo Orbit around L1 point.

Name: Chandrayaan-3
MissionStatus: Historic Success! First soft landing near the lunar south pole.

Name: NVS-01
MissionStatus: Next-generation heavy communication satellite successfully deployed.
